document_data.title: Monstrous Compendium Planescape Appendix II
document_data.author: [[Rich Baker]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Monstrous Compendium Planescape Appendix II''''' is a 2{{nd}}-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' accessory. It is part of the ''Planescape'' campaign setting.

{{Quote|''This MONSTROUS COMPENDIUM appendix contains nearly 100 new monsters from the Outlands and various Outer Planes, and a few updated creatures that haven't seen print for quite some time. The aasimar, a new player character race, awaits your discovery - along with eladrins, hollyphants, rilmani, new tanar'ri, and more!''}}
document_data.Description:
The ''Monstrous Compendium Planescape Appendix II'' was published by TSR, Inc. in 1995 and is the second appendix in the Monstrous Compendium series for ''Planescape''. The supplement provides detailed information on various monsters and creatures from the planes of existence in the ''Planescape'' setting.

Each monster entry includes information on its habitat, behavior, society, and abilities. Additionally, the supplement provides new rules and game mechanics for creatures in the ''Planescape'' setting, such as new powers for demons and devils, new magical items, and new spells.
